header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 12, page 10, line 38, leave out from “which” to end of line 40 and insert “a person with expertise in a specified matter must carry out the assessment on behalf of the authority”
000: Clause 27, page 23, line 8, at end insert “and section 12(1)(f)”
